```{r setup}
library(cardinalR)
library(langevitour)
```

```{r}
plane_2d_data <- plane(sample_size = 300, coefficient_x_1 = 1, coefficient_x_2 = 1, coefficient_y_1 = -1, coefficient_y_2 = 1, intercept_x = -10, intercept_y = 8, 
u_min = 10, u_max = 30, v_min = 10, v_max = 20, num_noise_dims = 2, 
min_noise = 0, max_noise = 1)

colnames(plane_2d_data) <- paste0("x", 1:NCOL(plane_2d_data))

langevitour(plane_2d_data, pointSize = 2)
```
